Catalano.Imaging.Filters

Class SusanCornersDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Filters.SusanCornersDetector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICornersDetector

    public class SusanCornersDetector
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICornersDetector
    Susan corners detector. The class implements Susan corners detector, which is described by S.M. Smith in: S.M. Smith, "SUSAN - a new approach to low level image processing", Internal Technical Report TR95SMS1, Defense Research Agency, Chobham Lane, Chertsey, Surrey, UK, 1995.
